trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Bhil Bil is looking for an unsuspecting laborer to help him make a quick gil.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and slay gigantenders for their flesh.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_TODO_01<tab>Deliver a chunk of fruiting gigantender flesh to Bhil Bil.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_001<tab>Sinner! Over here! You have seen fruiting gigantenders nearby, yes?
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_002<tab>Very aggressive, they are. We Mord stay away from them, but someone like you... Yes, I have an idea.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_003<tab>You are healthy, strong! I have a favor to ask. Bring me chunks, big chunks of their flesh.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_004<tab>Go east from here and you will find them, or they will find you! You shall be rewarded if you do as I say. Quickly, now!
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_010<tab>Still here, but why? Maybe you have changed your mind, yes?
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_020<tab>You have it? Show me, show me!
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_022<tab>Heh heh... This is not for Mord mouths, no. A fine price this will fetch, though.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_023<tab>Sinners like you enjoy the flesh of the little ones. The big ones, not so much.
TEXT_LUCKZA020_03362_BHILBIL_000_024<tab>Yes, little ones are good for selling, but hard to catch, hard to kill. But not so difficult for you, it seems...
